name: cuid
description: Collision-resistant ids optimized for horizontal scaling and performance. For node and browsers.

scripts.build: mkdirp dist && browserify index.js -s cuid -o dist/cuid.js && uglifyjs dist/cuid.js -c -m -o dist/cuid.min.js
scripts.concat: concat-cli -f ./src/lib/headers/fingerprint ./src/lib/fingerprint.browser.js ./src/lib/footers/fingerprint -o lib/fingerprint.browser.js && concat-cli -f ./src/lib/headers/fingerprint.es6 ./src/lib/fingerprint.browser.js ./src/lib/footers/fingerprint.es6 -o lib/fingerprint.browser.es6.js && concat-cli -f ./src/lib/getRandomValue.browser.js ./src/lib/footers/getRandomValue -o lib/getRandomValue.browser.js && concat-cli -f ./src/lib/getRandomValue.browser.js ./src/lib/footers/getRandomValue.es6 -o lib/getRandomValue.browser.es6.js && concat-cli -f ./src/headers/pad ./src/lib/pad.js -o lib/pad.js && concat-cli -f ./src/lib/headers/pad.es6 ./src/lib/pad.js -o lib/pad.es6.js && concat-cli -f ./src/headers/index_license ./src/headers/index ./src/index.js ./src/footers/index -o index.js && concat-cli -f ./src/headers/index_license ./src/headers/index.es6 ./src/index.js -o index.es6.js
scripts.test: npm run -s lint && npm run -s test:server && npm run -s test:random && npm run -s test:browser
